translation.en: Small boat adrift!
Look, look starboard.
Up into the wind. Get out the small boat.
translation.ja: 風上だ　帆を下ろせ

translation.en: There's two of them, sir. A man and a woman.
- Dead or alive? - Dead, sir.
- A child, sir. - A what?
Alive.
I'll take him.
We therefore commit their bodies to the bosom of the waters
translation.ja: 彼らの亡骸を 母なる海に戻します

translation.en: to be turned into corruption looking for the resurrection of the body
translation.ja: 彼らの亡骸を 母なる海に戻します 復活の日が訪れ 肉体が天に昇りますように

translation.en: when the sea shall give up her dead and the life of the world to come...
translation.ja: 復活の日が訪れ 肉体が天に昇りますように そしてキリストの栄光が 訪れますように

translation.en: Through Our Lord, Jesus Christ.
translation.ja: そしてキリストの栄光が 訪れますように

translation.en: Captain.
The surgeon would like to have a word with you, sir.
The sickness in the crew, sir.
You've got five more taken down since midwatch.
Fever. Canker sores.
Your cabinet is full of bromide. Now, leech it out.
translation.ja: 鎮静剤を打ち 血を抜け

translation.en: It's beyond bleeding, sir.
Mr. Penfield... I look to your medical knowledge.
translation.ja: 君の医学知識が頼りなんだ

translation.en: Three days after we left Moorea, you thought it was scurvy.
translation.ja: 最初は壊血病だと 言っていたのが

translation.en: Half the crew took sick. You told me it was breakbone fever.
The symptoms weren't for certain. Now I know.
translation.ja: 症状が不明瞭だったからです

translation.en: Fever. Withered skin.
translation.ja: 高熱 乾燥した肌 黒胆汁

translation.en: Black bile.
translation.ja: 乾燥した肌 黒胆汁

translation.en: Cholera.
Can't we turn back, Captain?
There's no port for a plague ship.
translation.ja: 伝染病だと入港できない

translation.en: Drop anchor at the first island.
This is all open sea.
With due respect, Captain, that small boat put off from somewheres.
translation.ja: あのボートは どこから来たんだろう

translation.en: This is a French naval chart. There's nothing but warnings.
translation.ja: 仏海軍の海図だ 危険が多すぎる

translation.en: There's reefs, atolls.
This is a cruel turn for Mrs. Hargrave.
translation.ja: ハーグレイブ夫人も 運が悪い

translation.en: Left widowed with an infant.
Cast them adrift.
A woman alone with two children?
translation.ja: 女 子供だけで 漂流させるのか？

translation.en: Put a man with them. Kearney's strong, and he's still able.
translation.ja: 男をつける　ケニーがタフだ

translation.en: That'll give them a chance. That's more than I can say for us.
Kearney.
Best of a poor lot.
But keep it from the rest of the crew. - Wait till midwatch. - Aye, sir.
translation.ja: 他の者には言うな 下船は夜明け前だ

translation.en: Putting us off into the peril of an open sea because some of the crew are ill?
translation.ja: 皆が病気だからって 海に放り出すの？

translation.en: - This is madness. - I'm thinking of your own good, ma'am.
translation.ja: ひどいわ 配慮からです

translation.en: I may be young, but I have spent the last three years
translation.ja: 年は若いけど ３年間 猛暑にめげず

translation.en: In a climate of fearsome heat with insects as big as rats
translation.ja: 年は若いけど ３年間 猛暑にめげず 巨大ネズミや虫にも耐えたわ

translation.en: and rats as big as cats.
translation.ja: 巨大ネズミや虫にも耐えたわ

translation.en: I can certainly deal with some deckhands down with fever.
translation.ja: 高熱ぐらいヘッチャラよ

translation.en: We're carrying cholera. If you stay aboard, you'll die.
translation.ja: コレラです 船に残れば確実に死ぬ

translation.en: You can't take your sea chest, missus. Only things you really need.
translation.ja: 必要な物だけ持って下さい

translation.en: But everything we have in the world would be in this chest.
translation.ja: もともと荷物は少ないわ

translation.en: Mrs. Hargrave will be taking her belongings.
Cholera?
Mr. Kearney? Mr. Kearney, a cup of water, please.
translation.ja: ケニーさん お水を下さらない？

translation.en: There's only so much, missus.
They're in sore need, Mr. Kearney.
Look, the boy ain't yours, so he don't matter too much.
Your infant knows what to do.
I'd say you're fresh. Let her suckle.
translation.ja: 立派な胸だな 乳でも飲ませろ

translation.en: I'll tell you right now. I'm sick and tired of them two squalling.
translation.ja: 泣かせるな　イライラする

translation.en: Then, for the love of God, give them water.
I'm a practical man, missus.
If I was alone, by myself, this could last a good while.
translation.ja: 俺１人だと この水で結構生きられる

translation.en: Sharing four ways makes no sense.
translation.ja: ４人で分けたら 先はない

translation.en: The best thing for all of us is to put them out of their misery.
translation.ja: 殺した方が子供も楽だ

translation.en: You won't touch them.
I'll do what has to be done. Shut them up, or they're both going overboard.
translation.ja: 黙らせないと 海に放り込むぞ

translation.en: That's it. Look the other way if you don't want to see.
translation.ja: クソッ　我慢できん

translation.en: Come on, Richard. Come quickly.
You can help Mama.
Come on. Come on, Lilli.
Richard, you stay here.
translation.ja: リチャード　待ってて

translation.en: It's fresh.
Look.
Bananas and papaws.
translation.ja: 見て　バナナよ パパイヤも

translation.en: And roots. Roots are good eating.
translation.ja: タロイモもある おいしいのよ

translation.en: This is taro root. We ate it at the mission.
translation.ja: 伝道所にいた頃 よく食べたわ

translation.en: And bananas. Come on, Richard. Here's some bananas.
translation.ja: リチャード　バナナよ

translation.en: Yes, lots of bananas.
Boat.
The boat is coming.
Boat.
Look. How pretty.
We can't stay here.
We're too exposed on this side.
We've got to find a safe haven out of the weather.
translation.ja: 雨風を しのげる所へ

translation.en: Come, Richard. Let's go for a little walk.
Here we go.
Look. How beautiful!
translation.ja: 見て　なんて美しいの

translation.en: House.
Good heavens.
She's gone.
I know she's gone.
Your mama's gone.
It's all right. It's all right. Come here, I've got you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　さあおいで

translation.en: Mommy's gone.
I know. It's all right.
Your mama's not here, but I am. I'll be your mommy from now on.
translation.ja: 私がいるわ　今日から あなたのママよ

translation.en: Any passing ship will be able to see this when it's ablaze.
translation.ja: 船が通ったら 火で合図するの

translation.en: It won't be long before one finds us.
Go to sleep now. Close your eyes.
I'll be right back.
I know this is your favorite dessert, Richard, but eat more slowly.
translation.ja: もう少し ゆっくり食べて

translation.en: And hold the spoon this way, as I've showed you.
translation.ja: スプーンは こうやって 持つのよ

translation.en: After the ship comes, you'll find yourself seated at a well- appointed table in San Francisco
translation.ja: シスコの高級レストランで 食事をする時に

translation.en: and be expected to show proper table manners.
Richard, don't do that.
translation.ja: リチャード　悪い子ね

translation.en: Just because we are away from civilization, does not mean we will behave uncivilized.
translation.ja: 文明のない土地でも 不作法は許しませんよ

translation.en: Full moon.
They come every three months when the moon is full.
Off to bed, children. Quickly.
Richard, come.
It'll be all right.
Tonight you will get your lullaby in the dark.
Love Divine, all Loves excelling
translation.ja: 神の たもう愛 　　　あまつ喜び

translation.en: Joy of Heaven to Earth come down
translation.ja: 恵みに満ちたる 　　　あがない主よ

translation.en: Fix in us thy humble Dwelling
translation.ja: 御前に ひれふし 　　　　祈る我らに

translation.en: All thy faithful Mercies crown
translation.ja: 尊き 御慈悲を 　　　もたらしたまえ

translation.en: The mother.
Put it down!
Mother, why do you wear your clothes when you bathe?
Because it's proper.
Why don't Richard and I wear clothes when we bathe?
translation.ja: なぜ私たちだけ裸なの

translation.en: I gave up on you two long ago. I'd put your clothes on, and you'd just take them off.
translation.ja: あきらめたの 着せても すぐ脱ぐから

translation.en: - I wish I looked like Richard down there. - Why?
translation.ja: 男の子になりたい なぜ

translation.en: Because he can aim when he goes...
I can hit a mango leaf dead center.
translation.ja: マンゴーの葉に命中する

translation.en: Why does he have one he can aim and we don't?
translation.ja: なぜ私たちにはないの？

translation.en: God, in his infinite wisdom, decided...
translation.ja: 神様の賢明なる判断で…

translation.en: Well, nature gave us different parts.
translation.ja: 異なる物が与えられたの

translation.en: - Well, you see, a female has a-- - A cowrie shell.
translation.ja: 女性には… タカラ貝

translation.en: Lilli looks like a cowrie shell down there.
So that's what you call mine, a cowrie shell.
translation.ja: これから そう呼んで

translation.en: - And we call Richard's a-- - No.
Never mind. I think this has gone a little far.
translation.ja: それは聞かない方が よさそう

translation.en: I should've explained certain of life's facts to you years ago.
translation.ja: 性教育すべきだったわ

translation.en: Explain certain of life's facts now.
translation.ja: 今から性教育をしてよ

translation.en: No, I need to think about it first.
I'll explain it to you after your spelling lesson tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 勉強の後で説明するわ

translation.en: - Come on. Let's rinse. - Tonight? Let's rinse off. All right? Everybody?
translation.ja: 髪もすすぎましょ さあ 行くわよ

translation.en: Why do people get married?
It was God's commandment that when a man and woman love each other... They take vows.
translation.ja: 愛し合う男女が神の掟に従い 愛を誓うの

translation.en: Vows are like promises.
They make promises to each other in the eyes of God for the whole world to witness.
translation.ja: 神の前で世界中に 愛を証明する

translation.en: And that's called the marriage ceremony.
And here is the ceremony your father used to say
translation.ja: パパは これを見て

translation.en: when he performed marriages at the mission.
translation.ja: 結婚式を取り仕切ってた

translation.en: What about the life of facts?
When a girl becomes a woman and a boy becomes a man...
translation.ja: 少女が女に 少年が男に変わる時…

translation.en: When's that?
Well, it's different for everyone, but you'll know when it happens to you.
translation.ja: 人によるけど 今にわかるわ

translation.en: How?
Your body will become rounder. You'll grow breasts like mine.
translation.ja: 体が丸くなって 胸がふくらんでくるの

translation.en: And every month you'll bleed from the opening between your legs.
translation.ja: 毎月 脚の間から出血するわ

translation.en: I don't want to bleed.
It only lasts a few days.
And it's a great blessing, because it means you can have a baby.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが産める印なの

translation.en: Do I have to bleed?
But your body will change, too. Your voice will grow deeper, and you'll grow hair on your face.
translation.ja: 男の子は声が低くなり ヒゲが生えてくる

translation.en: And I think you'd look very handsome with a beard. Unless, of course, you want to scrape it off.
translation.ja: あごヒゲの似合う ハンサムになるわよ

translation.en: I want the baby now.
You can't. You're not ready yet.
translation.ja: 無理よ　早すぎるわ

translation.en: When you are, you need the man to make the baby that will grow inside you.
translation.ja: おなかの子は男の人と作るの

translation.en: Inside me?
Yes. There's a special place inside a woman
translation.ja: 特別の場所があるのよ

translation.en: where the baby stays nice and warm and safe
translation.ja: 赤ん坊は 居心地のいい安全な所で

translation.en: until it's ready to be born into the world.
How does the baby get in there?
After they're married, the man and woman lie very...
translation.ja: 結婚した後 男女が一緒に寝て

translation.en: Close together...
translation.ja: 体を寄せ合い その…

translation.en: - And-- - I know. It's like the iguanas, Lilli.
translation.ja: 知ってる 大トカゲと同じだ

translation.en: You know when they get so close you can't tell where one begins and the other ends?
translation.ja: くっついて 塊みたいになるんだ

translation.en: - That's it. - That's it?
Yes. Because the iguanas always have their babies soon after.
translation.ja: 大トカゲは すぐ子供を産む

translation.en: That's it, Mother?
Well, that's most of it.
That's what I've been waiting to hear all day?
translation.ja: この話を一日中 待たされたの？

translation.en: That's not going to help.
Look what you did to my spear. Go away.
translation.ja: よくもやったな あっちに行け

translation.en: That was my fish. Go back out where you belong.
translation.ja: 僕の魚だぞ 自分の海に帰れ

translation.en: Richard, look. Now what are we gonna do?
translation.ja: あれを見て　どうしよう

translation.en: What are we gonna do now, Richard?
- What are we gonna do? - Will you just be quiet and let me think?
translation.ja: 返事して 少し黙っててよ

translation.en: Lilli!
Richard!
We're out past sunset. Mother's gonna be so angry.
translation.ja: 日が沈むとママが怒るわ

translation.en: - What are you doing? - I've got an idea.
translation.ja: 何すんの 見てなって

translation.en: He's coming, come on.
Where have you been?
Do you realize how late it is?
Yes, Mother, but there was this shark, an old one
translation.ja: サメがいたの 大きなサメで ヤリを壊されたわ

translation.en: out in the channel. He took half of Richard's spear.
translation.ja: 大きなサメで ヤリを壊されたわ

translation.en: I have told you to keep away from sharks.
translation.ja: サメには近づかないで

translation.en: - The boat drifted loose. - What are the rules, Richard?
translation.ja: ボートが流された ルールを言って

translation.en: - Be home by sunset always. - And?
translation.ja: 日没には帰る それから？

translation.en: - Never to the north side of the island. - Do you see that? A full moon.
translation.ja: “北側へ行かない” あれを見て　満月よ

translation.en: We are going straight home, and this is never happening again. Do you hear me?
translation.ja: 早く帰りましょ 二度と遅れないでね

translation.en: Come, O thou Traveler unknown
translation.ja: 夜更けの川辺で 　　　　友と別れて

translation.en: Whom still I hold, but cannot see!
translation.ja: ひとりで 　　物思いにふける時

translation.en: My company before is gone
translation.ja: まだ見ぬあなたが 　　　　　　心の中に

translation.en: And I am left alone with Thee
Lilli. Richard. Go get some thatch.
Get back inside.
Our Father who art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
translation.ja: 天なる父よ 御名の尊まれん事を

translation.en: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done...
translation.ja: 御心の天になるごとく 地にもなさせたまえ

translation.en: On earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread.
translation.ja: 御心の天になるごとく 地にもなさせたまえ 日用の糧を 今日も我らに与えたまえ…

translation.en: And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.ja: 日用の糧を 今日も我らに与えたまえ…

translation.en: I can feel that the sickness has moved into my lungs now.
translation.ja: 肺の病気にかかったみたい

translation.en: And that means I might not get well.
translation.ja: つまり… もう助からないの

translation.en: What's going to happen?
You may have to be here without me.
If God wants...
translation.ja: 天国へ行けたら お父様に会える

translation.en: I'll be with your father, and we'll be like guardian angels
translation.ja: 天国へ行けたら お父様に会える 天使になって あなたたちを見守るわ

translation.en: watching over you.
translation.ja: 天使になって あなたたちを見守るわ

translation.en: This is my special place.
It's quiet here, and I can see the house.
translation.ja: とても静かで 私たちの家が見える

translation.en: Hollow out this ground... About so deep.
translation.ja: この場所に うんと深い穴を掘って

translation.en: And line it with thatch and moss.
Then fill it in... And smooth it over with earth.
translation.ja: 私を寝かせ 土をかぶせて

translation.en: I'll write out a prayer for you to say.
translation.ja: 祈りの文は書いておくわ

translation.en: We'll carve a marker, and it will say,
translation.ja: 墓標には こう刻んで

translation.en: Here lies Sarah Hargrave... Wife of William...
translation.ja: “サラ･ハーグレイブは ウィリアムの妻であり”

translation.en: Mother of Lillian.
And I know I'm not your real mother, Richard
but I would like to have it say, and Mother of Richard.
translation.ja: こう言わせて “リチャードの母親”

translation.en: We pray to the Lord to grant this last abiding wish.
translation.ja: 天なる父よ 我らの願いを聞きたまえ

translation.en: That Lilli and Richard love one another, and take care of one another
translation.ja: リリーとリチャードは 互いに愛し 助け合い

translation.en: and keep up with their lessons, and be prepared for the ship when it comes.
translation.ja: 勉強して 文明に帰る準備をします

translation.en: - Breakfast looks extra good today. - Thank you.
translation.ja: 最高の朝食だ 忘れないで 明日は あなたの番よ

translation.en: Don't forget, it's your turn to cook tomorrow.
translation.ja: 忘れないで 明日は あなたの番よ

translation.en: I won't forget. You're the one who always forgets.
translation.ja: 忘れるのは いつも君の方だろ

translation.en: What do I forget?
You forgot to color your eggs for the hunt.
I didn't forget. I just don't think we should do it this year.
translation.ja: 覚えてたけど 必要ないと思うの

translation.en: But we do it every Easter.
The marks on the calendar say tomorrow's Easter, so we must have the hunt.
translation.ja: イースターに 卵探しは付き物だ

translation.en: Why?
How else do we know who finds the most eggs and wins?
translation.ja: たくさん見つける競争だ

translation.en: Wins what, Richard?
I don't know. Nothing.
translation.ja: さあね 何もない　勝つだけさ

translation.en: Just wins.
translation.ja: 何もない　勝つだけさ

translation.en: It seems silly to me. I don't understand why we have to do it.
translation.ja: バカげてるわ 無意味だと思う

translation.en: Because Mother would want us to.
I've got an idea.
Whoever finds the most eggs this year wins a prize.
translation.ja: 今年の勝者は賞品がもらえる

translation.en: But what kind of prize?
If you win, I've gotta give you something.
translation.ja: 君が勝てば僕が贈る その逆なら 何かくれよ

translation.en: And if I win, you've gotta give me something.
translation.ja: その逆なら 何かくれよ

translation.en: It's a wonderful idea.
I hid ten eggs somewhere between the beach and the berry patch.
translation.ja: 砂浜とバナナの木の間に 10個隠した

translation.en: I hid ten eggs between the rocks and the fern glade.
translation.ja: 私は岩場と湿地の間よ

translation.en: - Ready? - Ready.
translation.ja: いくぞ 用意　スタート

translation.en: Get set. Go!
I found nine. Beat that.
- I only found eight. - The winner's me!
translation.ja: ８個だ 私の勝ちね　賞品は？

translation.en: Where's my prize?
translation.ja: 私の勝ちね　賞品は？

translation.en: Richard, you were down there so long. What were you doing?
You'll see.
Your prize.
I'm going to keep this forever.
My prize.
The white bead.
I think it looks nice in my hair.
translation.ja: 私の髪に映えると思うの

translation.en: Do you?
I don't care what you do with it. Or how you wear it.
translation.ja: どこに つけようが 君の勝手だ

translation.en: You can hang it from your nose for all I care.
Back and forth.
Round and round. You think this whole reef is yours.
translation.ja: 我が物顔に 海を泳ぎまくってる

translation.en: You think you can swallow anything that swims.
translation.ja: 何でも のみ込む気だ

translation.en: You'd like to catch me, wouldn't you?
But I was too fast for you, stupid sea slug.
translation.ja: 捕まるもんか グズめ

translation.en: I can beat you every time.
And if you don't believe me, I'll prove it.
translation.ja: 信じないなら証明してやる

translation.en: Master of the reef!
The first time he almost got me, but I was too fast for him.
translation.ja: 最初の時は ほとんど捕まりかけた

translation.en: This time he was lying in wait.
translation.ja: 今回は待ち伏せされたんだ

translation.en: So I dive in, and I can see down his mouth.
translation.ja: 飛び込んだら目の前に 500本の歯があった

translation.en: There's about 500 teeth.
translation.ja: 飛び込んだら目の前に 500本の歯があった 奴は小魚を従えて 攻撃してきた

translation.en: There's stripy little fish around his gills. And he comes at me...
translation.ja: 奴は小魚を従えて 攻撃してきた

translation.en: He misses me. Stupid sea slug.
translation.ja: 追いつけない　グズめ

translation.en: - It seems silly to me. - Silly?
translation.ja: バカだわ 何だと？ 冗談じゃない 危険なんだぜ

translation.en: It's not silly. It's dangerous.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 冗談じゃない 危険なんだぜ

translation.en: Exactly. That's why it's silly.
translation.ja: だから バカなのよ

translation.en: I don't understand why you have to do it.
I like the way it makes me feel.
- What do you mean? - Inside here.
It feels all alive when I know I'm master of the reef.
translation.ja: 我こそ海の王者だと 実感するんだ

translation.en: The master of the reef. The master of the reef.
Don't you ever make fun of me.
I'm sorry.
Besides, you're the silly one. Always touching yourself and looking at yourself.
translation.ja: バカは君だ 鏡の前で自分を触ってる

translation.en: I don't touch myself.
Yes, you do.
You're always touching those when you look in the mirror.
I'm just measuring how much they've grown.
You shouldn't be looking at me when I'm naked.
translation.ja: 人の裸を のぞかないで

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ja: 前は平気だったくせに

translation.en: - I used to see you naked all the time. - Well, it's different now.
translation.ja: 前は平気だったくせに 今は違うの

translation.en: - Why? - I don't know.
translation.ja: なぜさ わからない とにかく違うのよ

translation.en: I don't know why it's different, but it is.
translation.ja: わからない とにかく違うのよ

translation.en: Lilli?
I just wish things could be the way they used to be when we had fun.
translation.ja: 昔に戻りたいよ あの頃は楽しかった

translation.en: Remember the seesaw she made us?
The games we used to play?
Ring around the rosie?
Ring around the rosie Pocket full of posies
translation.ja: 赤いはれものは 　　　　薬草が一番

translation.en: Ashes, ashes
translation.ja: ゼイゼイ 　　ヒーヒー

translation.en: We all fall down
translation.ja: みんな 死んじゃう

translation.en: Richard?
You wouldn't mind if I moved my bed to another part of the house?
translation.ja: 寝る所を別々にしても 構わない？

translation.en: No.
If you weren't gonna do it, I was.
How long have you been there?
I saw the blood on the quilt.
Are you all right?
Do you remember
what Mother said would happen when I became a woman?
Well, I've become one.
Richard, wake up.
Wake up.
translation.ja: リチャード  起きて

translation.en: I can't sleep with my bed facing the wrong way. Help me move it.
translation.ja: ベッドを動かすの 手伝って

translation.en: - As soon as I'm awake. - You are awake.
translation.ja: 起きたら 起きてるわ

translation.en: Stop it! Let go, I'm not dressed.
Wrap the quilt around you.
Come on.
What's wrong? You're all humped over.
Just give me a minute.
What happened to it?
It gets that way all the time now.
- Does it hurt? - No.
Can you walk?
I can walk just fine. And I can make it go away if I want to, too.
translation.ja: もちろんさ その気になれば直せる

translation.en: - How? - None of your business.
translation.ja: どうやって？ 秘密だ

translation.en: If we start keeping secrets, nothing will be the same.
translation.ja: 隠し事は いけないわ

translation.en: Nothing's the same around here anyway. Nothing's the way it used to be!
translation.ja: 何とでも言え 今までとは違うんだ

translation.en: Come on, let's move your stupid bed.
Mother.
I don't know what to do.
He's changed, I've changed.
Everything's so confusing.
translation.ja: すべてが混乱してるの

translation.en: I'm tired of you always snooping on me. Go away.
I'm sick of you always telling me to go away.
translation.ja: また そのセリフか

translation.en: Go away, Richard. I mean it.
Fine. I'm going where I've always wanted to. To the north side of the island.
translation.ja: 好きな所に行くさ 島の北側でも

translation.en: No, you can't do that. You know we're in a full moon.
translation.ja: やめて　今夜は満月よ

translation.en: - I can do whatever I want to do. - No, you can't. It's a rule.
translation.ja: 僕の勝手だ ルールでしょ

translation.en: It's not my rule, it was her rule. She wasn't even my real mother anyway.
translation.ja: サラのルールだ 僕の母親じゃない

translation.en: She loved you like she was your real mother.
I don't care. I'm sick of her rules, and I'm sick of your rules.
translation.ja: 関係ないね ルールなんかクソくらえ

translation.en: From now on, I can do whatever I want to do.
I'm old enough. I can go wherever I want to go, and come home when I want to.
translation.ja: 僕は大人だ 人に指図されたくない

translation.en: What happened? What have you done?
I had to hide.
There were all these heathens, and they danced around me.
translation.ja: 連中は踊ってて 気づかなかった

translation.en: They didn't see me. If they had, I'd have been dead.
translation.ja: 連中は踊ってて 気づかなかった 危ないとこだ

translation.en: And there was this one heathen, and at first I wanted to kill him.
translation.ja: 連中の１人に出くわし 殺そうと思ったが

translation.en: And then I didn't want to kill him. And then I couldn't kill him.
translation.ja: すぐに気が変わった 僕には殺せないよ

translation.en: Then he saw you. He'll tell the others.
No. I let him go. Peace.
I hope you're right. Richard, I'm so glad you're not hurt.
translation.ja: 無事に戻れて よかったわ

translation.en: I thought I'd never see you again. I never want us to fight again. Ever.
translation.ja: もう会えないかと思った 二度とケンカしないわ

translation.en: Me either.
- Lilli? - Yes?
- Friends? - Oh, yes. Always.
I feel like crying.
So do I.
- I want us to be husband and wife. - Yes.
With this ring, I thee wed.
translation.ja: この指輪に 愛を誓う

translation.en: With this ring, I thee wed, Richard.
translation.ja: この指輪に 愛を誓うわ　リチャード

translation.en: Amen.
- And now we're-- - One...
Forever.
Look.
Lilli, hurry. The signal fire!
Richard, what if they're heathens? I'm frightened.
Maybe we shouldn't light the signal fire. Let's see who they are first.
translation.ja: 火は後回しだ まず確認しよう

translation.en: There's eight people.
The one in the light covering may be a woman.
translation.ja: 白い色の服は 女だな

translation.en: Woman?
Keep them in your sight. They may not be civilized.
translation.ja: 文明人では ないかもしれん

translation.en: Civilized. C- i- v- i- l- i- z- e- d.
Remember what Mother said about a good, firm handshake.
translation.ja: ママに教わった握手を

translation.en: My name is Richard. We've been waiting for you for a long time.
translation.ja: リチャードです 長い間 待ってました

translation.en: I'm Lilli, and I'm ready for you to take us back to civilization.
translation.ja: リリーです 帰る準備はできてます

translation.en: I am Capt. Jacob Hilliard, master of the Trade Wind.
translation.ja: 私はヒリアード “貿易風号”の船長だ

translation.en: And we... Is this your land?
Yes. My house is there.
translation.ja: ええ　あれが家です

translation.en: Well, we're in need of fresh water. Our casks are fouled.
Will you grant us permission to come ashore?
translation.ja: 上陸しても構わないかね？

translation.en: Yes. You are welcome here.
translation.ja: ようこそ この島へ

translation.en: If you don't mind covering yourself, I'll get my daughter.
translation.ja: 何か着てくれ　娘がいる

translation.en: Does that binding around your neck choke you?
No, certainly not.
Well, yes, sometimes. I'd appreciate it if you'd...
translation.ja: まあな… 時には苦しい それより服を

translation.en: How do you catch fish with that spear?
It's not a spear, mate.
- What is it? - It's a rifle.
translation.ja: 何なの ライフルさ

translation.en: Blow a man's head right off his shoulders.
Castaways. How exciting.
translation.ja: 白人が？ 興奮するわ

translation.en: They seem to be an odd mixture of knowledge and ignorance.
translation.ja: 教養と無知が同居している

translation.en: Their attire is a little bit...
translation.ja: 彼らの服装が その…

translation.en: Well, it's quite sparse.
Is anything wrong?
The color, it's the same as the sky.
translation.ja: この色 空と同じだわ

translation.en: Pure silk.
With my compliments.
And one for your brother.
Oh, he's not my brother. He's my husband.
translation.ja: 兄じゃないわ　夫なの

translation.en: Your husband?
Mother died six years ago.
- How do you follow the years? - She taught us.
translation.ja: 年月の計算は？ サラから教わった 満月が12回で１年だ

translation.en: We count the moons. We know that twelve full moons are one year.
translation.ja: サラから教わった 満月が12回で１年だ

translation.en: We have Christmas and Thanksgiving and Easter.
translation.ja: クリスマスや イースターも祝うわ

translation.en: Although we're not exactly sure we celebrate them on the right days.
translation.ja: 日にちは確かじゃないけど

translation.en: It's utterly amazing, the two of you all these years...
translation.ja: 驚きだよ 神に見放された島で 何年も２人きりとは

translation.en: In this remote godforsaken place.
translation.ja: 神に見放された島で 何年も２人きりとは

translation.en: Not godforsaken, Capt. Hilliard.
Not godforsaken at all.
You do set an excellent table. My compliments to the chef.
translation.ja: 見事な盛り付けだな シェフの腕がいい

translation.en: Look, Sylvia. They've fashioned their own dinnerware.
Cups, soup spoons. Ingenious.
translation.ja: カップにスプーン 実に独創的だ

translation.en: Won't Mr. Quinlan be joining us?
Mr. Quinlan is a seafarer and prefers to be by himself.
translation.ja: 彼は海の男だから 孤独を愛するのさ

translation.en: It's plain to see why you've been lost for so long.
translation.ja: 発見されなくて当然だ

translation.en: The charts don't even show this island.
It's a wonder we found you.
Heathens come to the north side of the island, at certain times.
translation.ja: 先住民が定期的に 北側から来る

translation.en: There's a burial ground there.
This is ever so tasty. A great treat from the slop we have to eat on the ship.
translation.ja: おいしいわ 船の食事は最悪なの

translation.en: What is it?
Eel broth.
Eel?
Well, only the broth is eel.
The little white chunks are sea urchin.
We appreciate your hospitality and hope that you'll offer us the opportunity to repay you.
translation.ja: 君たちのもてなしに 何か お礼がしたい

translation.en: You can.
You can take us with you, back to civilization.
I should think... It must be awfully boring here.
translation.ja: やっぱりね 退屈な島だもの

translation.en: What is the meaning of boring?
Well, boring is when you have nothing whatever to do.
translation.ja: 何もする事のない状態よ

translation.en: So you're bored. Like you must be here.
translation.ja: この島じゃ退屈するわよね

translation.en: No. We're never bored.
Boots, and a shirt, and cotton trousers.
translation.ja: ブーツにシャツ 綿のズボンだ

translation.en: I'll let Sylvia explain the female garments.
Well, carry on.
Buttons.
I remember buttons on Mother's dress.
translation.ja: ママの服についてたわ

translation.en: It's Irish lace.
Richard, you'll have to turn your head. I'm going to show Lillian a foundation garment.
translation.ja: あっちを向いて 下着をつけるの

translation.en: Although, I dare say, there isn't much you haven't seen.
- What does it do? - It goes around the waist, like this.
translation.ja: これは？ ウエストに巻くの　こうよ

translation.en: And then cinch the drawstring.
Don't look yet, Richard. I'm showing Lillian my secrets.
translation.ja: まだダメよ 女だけの秘密なの

translation.en: Look. This is velvet plush.
translation.ja: 見て ベルベットにシルバー

translation.en: And these are silver.
translation.ja: ベルベットにシルバー

translation.en: It's so smooth.
Hairbrush and comb. Powder puff.
translation.ja: ブラシにクシ パフよ

translation.en: And rouge, and powder.
Lavender water.
Musk- rose perfume.
And a hand mirror.
You're very pretty. Except for the hue of your skin, but we can fix that.
translation.ja: 美人よ　手入れすれば 日焼けは治るわ

translation.en: What's wrong with my skin?
The sun has tainted it all brown. We'll have to lighten it with lemon juice.
translation.ja: 色白になるには レモン汁が一番よ

translation.en: Why?
Well, you don't want people in San Francisco to think you're a field hand, do you?
translation.ja: シスコで田舎娘だと 思われずに済むわ

translation.en: That's worse than fish fat.
It's quite costly.
Well, look at you.
You do look handsome in your boulevard suit.
So handsome.
Do you think I've applied too much rouge, Richard?
No. I think it's beautiful.
Well, thank you, kind sir.
Now I'm all powder and paint with nothing to do, as usual.
translation.ja: 化粧しても する事がない

translation.en: We could go outside and count stars.
Is that what you do here at night? Count stars?
translation.ja: 毎晩 星を数えてるの？

translation.en: Sometimes we count stars.
Sometimes I play my whistle, and we sing. Sometimes we mate. Sometimes we sleep.
translation.ja: 笛を吹いたり 愛し合ったりする

translation.en: Mate?
- Yes. - Do you mate often?
Whenever we want to.
Just like that?
Sometimes we dance. I love to dance.
Come on, Richard. Let's show Sylvia how we dance.
translation.ja: シルビアに見せましょ

translation.en: Come on, Sylvia. You try it.
I don't call that a dance. It's childish and simple- minded.
translation.ja: どこがダンスなのよ 子供の遊びだわ

translation.en: What do you mean?
Grown people don't dance like that.
translation.ja: 大人のダンスは違うの

translation.en: Maybe we should learn a grown- up dance for San Francisco?
translation.ja: シスコでダンスを習わなきゃ

translation.en: - I shall teach you. - Will you?
It's like this.
translation.ja: こうよ　セクシーにね

translation.en: It's a bit naughty. It's called the Spanish polka.
translation.ja: こうよ　セクシーにね ポルカよ

translation.en: Spirit`s willing, flesh is weak
Kiss me, darling, on the cheek
translation.ja: ダーリン ホッペにキスをして

translation.en: Now do it slow.
You're a beautiful dancer, Richard. One, two, three.
Lillian's going to have to brush up on her manners.
It's not polite to leave your guest in the middle of a lesson.
Sorry, but she'll just have to wait her turn.
translation.ja: 順番を待つべきなのに

translation.en: She's gonna teach me how to mazurka.
As soon as I get it right, I'll show you.
You lied to me.
When did I lie to you?
You told me once that you'd never hurt me.
translation.ja: 私を傷つけない約束よ

translation.en: How did I hurt you?
When you always stare at her, it hurts me.
I'm sorry.
It's just that she's so different.
In what way?
Just look at her. The way she's all covered up.
translation.ja: 彼女は いつも体を隠してる

translation.en: But you said you found all those clothes stupid and unnecessary.
translation.ja: 服はジャマだと 言ってたくせに

translation.en: I do.
It's just... I wonder what she looks like underneath all of them.
You mean, you want to look at her, because you can't see her?
translation.ja: 見えないから気になるの？

translation.en: You remember when I wanted to go to the north side of the island just because I couldn't?
translation.ja: 見た事ないから 北側へも行った

translation.en: Yes, I do.
And I also remember what almost happened to you when you did go.
translation.ja: また ひどい目に遭うわよ

translation.en: Good night, Richard.
- What have you done to yourself? - Don't you like it?
translation.ja: どうした 似合わない？

translation.en: No. Wash it off.
You don't like it on me, but you love it on Sylvia.
translation.ja: シルビアなら いいのね

translation.en: Please, Lilli, let's not fight.
- We promised we'd never fight. - No.
You never eat breakfast anymore. Are you sick?
Richard, I'm ready for my lesson now.
translation.ja: リチャード 出かけましょ

translation.en: I promised to teach her how to fish.
Here we are together.
Out here in the middle of a beautiful fishpond.
In plain view of everyone. So respectable.
translation.ja: みんなに誤解されるわ

translation.en: But look at this, kind sir.
translation.ja: ねえ こっちを見て

translation.en: All we have to do is lower our heads...
And we're completely hidden from prying eyes.
So we can do whatever we want.
Lovely.
Get out of here!
Come on, don't be like that.
He'll never hear you. He'll be out playing games with Miss Sylvia for hours.
translation.ja: 来ないよ シルビアと お楽しみだ

translation.en: But you're missing something.
translation.ja: 待てよ　真珠はどこだ

translation.en: - Where's your lovely pearl? - I don't know what you mean.
translation.ja: 待てよ　真珠はどこだ 何の事？

translation.en: The white bead that you wear in your hair. Where is it?
At the house.
Lilli.
It's no time to be thinking about Lilli.
I told her I'd never hurt her.
Don't feel sorry for her, Richard. She's had you all to herself.
translation.ja: 彼女は あなたを独占しすぎよ

translation.en: But she doesn't own you. You're not married.
We are.
But not really. A lot of made up words in the middle of a jungle doesn't count.
translation.ja: ジャングルで誓っても 意味がないわ

translation.en: It does to me.
Why don't you just follow your heart.
translation.ja: 自分の心に素直に従えば？

translation.en: She is my heart.
Where is it?
You can't just leave me here.
Very rude behavior.
You'll never fit in civilized society.
Get away from her.
- That came from the house. - Get the other rifle, quickly.
Get him.
Help us!
Quinlan, you'll kill him.
All right, Quinlan, that's enough.
You heard me, I said enough.
Keep out of it, Giddens. I'll take his bloody head off.
translation.ja: 触るな　頭をフッ飛ばすぞ

translation.en: - Get off him. - Take orders. Put that down.
translation.ja: 命令だ　銃を捨てろ

translation.en: Bugger off.
You heard the Captain. Drop that, or you'll answer to mutiny.
- Quinlan, put it down. - Look out, Richard!
Run!
Are you all right?
I'm fine.
I always weather a storm well.
- I get that from Mother. - Yes, you do.
translation.ja: 母親似ね そうだな

translation.en: Capt. Hilliard says he wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.ja: 出航は夜明けだそうだ

translation.en: I guess that means Capt. Hilliard's daughter wants to set sail at dawn.
translation.ja: シルビアが 強引に決めたんだわ

translation.en: I don't care what she wants.
I don't care about her at all. I know that now, Lilli.
translation.ja: 彼女は どうでもいい

translation.en: Don't you understand, you're the most important thing to me.
translation.ja: 世界で一番大切なのは君だ

translation.en: You can set sail at dawn.
But we're not going.
You're not making sense.
Do you remember...
That lullaby she used to sing to us?
Love Divine all Loves excelling
translation.ja: 神の たもう愛 　　　　あまつ喜び

translation.en: Will you teach me to play it on this?
Why?
I'm going to have use for it.
There's a baby growing inside of me.
How do you know?
A woman knows these kind of things, that's how.
Lilli!
And I won't let it be born in civilization.
translation.ja: 文明社会で育てたくない

translation.en: I want it to be born right here.
Where there's no evil, and no lies, and no guns.
translation.ja: この島には邪悪や偽り 銃もないわ

translation.en: You're right.
We'll stay here.
Just the three of us.
I love you, Lilli.
